reviews.review:
The game is great.

As you know there are 4 survivor and one killer. So for the survivor teamwork is very important but if you have no friends to play with, just like me, the killer is a good option for you.
The abilities of each killer are mostly unique. For example the trapper has beartraps which he can set up so taht survivor run in them. The wraith can cloak himself and is nearly invisble so it is easy for him to come close to a survivor. There are plenty of other killer abilities. Sadly the survivor dont have such abilities, they only look different.

A really big part of the game is mindgaming. If you are chased by the killer you have to think where to go and what to do so you can survive a really long time. As the killer you have to think what the survivor could do and counter his strat. If you are a smart survivor you expect this and make some moves to make the killer think you would do this and not that. If you are an even smarter killer you expect this and have to find out what is a fake and what not. In the end the winner is the one who outsmarted the other.

The game is mostly balanced but there are some killer and some killer and survivor perks that are too good or just weak.
The big part of the community is great and stays positive even if you loose or are a looser. Of course there are some tryhards crying at the end but most of the time it is just ‚ô•‚ô•‚ô•‚ô•‚ô•‚ô•‚ô•‚ô•.

The only really big problem I see is the matchmaking in the higher ranks. When you get on rank 4 or above it feels like it is completely luck based if you get way too strong enemies/mates or way too weak ones. I win a game with 4 kills and one after that I can chase a survivor for 15 minutes straight and still dont get a hit.
But for problems like that the rank reset exists and after that you have some games with fair enemies/mates.

After you played a bit (a bit is for like 100-250 hrs or more) it can happen thatyou get bored of every killer you have and every survivor perk combo you wanted to try. Because of that you can buy non-licensed killer in the ingame shop.. While playing you get shards which can be spend on cosmetics or non-licensed killer. I think you have to play about 25 hrs to get 9000. That is how much a killer or survivor costs.
I would rather recommend to buy the killer because survivor just have a different look with 3 new perks and thats it.
You can also buy licensed killer like Michael Myers or Pyramide head in the steam shop as a DLC but those only can be bought with real money.
Every 3 months a new killer and survivor is released so you never get tired of learning how to play them.

All in all you can easily spend over 600 hrs in the game and you still dont know how to play all killer or every survivor strat. It is a good game to play alone or with friends if you have some. Buy it so they can bring out new killer and survivor.

muito bom tirando a parte dos argentinos e chilenos com 700+ de ping, todos os outros bugs que a merda da BHVR nao corrige porque nao tem concorr√™ncia, toxicidade de quase todos os lobbys com chilenos e argentinos te chamando de m4c4k0 brasileiro. excelente jogo pra acabar com sua semana üëç
So much fun even with friends

dead by daylight is a fun game if you have other friends to play it with, you should communicate with your friends to help your chances of escaping. If your going solo and have people who don't know  there doing the killer is most likely going to win, however if you have a 4 man of friends and you sorta know what you are doing then there is a high chance of you escaping. At first you won't know all of the perks (some are very annoying and unfair) so your going to have find out what they do on your own or watch someone else explain them so you know why these thing are happening in game. Overall i would recommend this game just keep in mind that it requires a lot of grinding for perks and there will be moments that seem very unfair so you have to learn how to counter them. 7.5/10

Basically a more complicated version of hide and seek, but it's a video game. Killers and Survivors both offer very different playstyles, graphics are decent but not amazing, the progression/perk system is really good even if it involves a bit too much grinding for my taste. 
9/10, I already wasted 50 hours in less than 2 weeks since buying it. Totally worth it. 

Later edit: Nope. Don't buy this, it's bad.
Trop bien ce jeux , du stress , de l‚Äôaction y‚Äôa de tout

DbD has got it's issues, there's no doubt. Bugs that come packaged with each new update, developers seemingly not caring for their customers concerns and complaints, a vocal minority of negative player interactions, the occasional hacker coming and going, and many more that would need a dedicated team of researchers to properly list, categorise and describe.

So, why am I recommending if there are really big issues that threaten the game's future? Well, maybe it's because of the rose-tinted glasses I willingly put on and the naive optimistic side of me that makes me actually come back almost on the daily. Despite the bugs and the toxicity and so forth, I genuinely enjoy the game. Flaws and all, it's one of my favourite games. There are other games I enjoy, games I'm saving up to play, and even other gaming platforms I play occasionally. Yet when I ask myself 'what am I playing today?', it's always Dead by Daylight.

I only make this review because I genuinely want this game to become better, even if my small insignificant review is lost in the sea of more competent and realistic reviews. I do recommend it, because it's a game I do enjoy. Who knows, maybe you'll enjoy it too, flaws and all.

TL:DR buggy game has issues, but I have Stockholm Syndrome.


EDIT: 1700+ hours later and now we have a controversy involving NFTs, voice lines that were stolen from us, and I'm fairly sure the buggy mess just got a fresher coat of paint. Also I think they managed to nerf Legion even more, but if they didn't well then they'll do that next update. (They even flattened the butts of some of the characters!)

On the bright side, at least they give us a percentage value rather then slapping Slightly/Considerably/Tremendously as a measurement unit...

many bugs and inconsistencies, but this game has potential. best when played with friends

Buggy, games with decent ping can take forever to find, devs are questionable at best, but it's fun if you have friends who just want to have a good time, there is no hilarity that compares when your stupid strats work way too well. The community is super toxic, but some are toxic to the point of "screwing with their brain is fun", so if you're that kind of person, that's good I guess.

10/10 will spawn next to the killer again.
Es un juego muy adictivo que han ido mejorando mucho con el tiempo. Lo recomiendo mucho

Pretty great cat and mouse game, and the victory against the opposition is always savory!

If you're down to outsmart a killer with (or without) the help of 3 other players, or really into using your smarts to hunt down the 4 survivors and kill them all, then this is the game for you!

Most of the characters can be unlocked by simply grinding up a particular resource, or by just buying them. Characters from other media, however, can only be purchased as DLC.

Co-op is available if you want to play with friends, as survivors.

Frustrating things about this game? It's getting consistent updates, so if there are any bugs, I wouldn't know. Bases seem covered.

Overall, it's super fun!

Dead By Daylight √® un gioco dalle meccaniche semplici ma dai gameplay difficili.
Sospetto che lo scopo lo conoscette gi√† se state guardando le recensioni ma se non lo sapete √® molto semplice. Ci sono 4 sopravvisuti e un killer, ci sono vari killer quindi differenti gameplay in base al killer. lo scopo dei sopravvisuti √® di riparare 5 generatori e scappare dalla porta principale. Lo scopo del killer √® ( se siete intelligenti ci arrvate da soli) uccidere i sopravissuti. Ogni personaggio ha dei propi perk (3) e sono possono essere molto utili o delle schifezze. In pratica Dead By Daylight √® un gioco molto grindoso ma quando si arriva ai rank pi√π alti (come il rank 1) ci si inizia a divertire sul serio. Lo consiglio a chi piace l'horror o a chi vuole interpretare il suo killer preferito come il GhostFace o Micheal Myers.
